top_pain_points.pain: Models are drifting and accuracy is degrading (fraud & customer churn models)
top_pain_points.example_quote: Models are drifting, need to improve accuracy (fraud & customer churn), takes DSPs 2 weeks to troubleshoot (70% of time) on avg, and usually the problem is still not solved

top_pain_points.pain: Data scientists spend 70% of time troubleshooting - averaging 2 weeks per issue
Even after weeks of troubleshooting, problems often remain unsolved
Building internal solutions creates technical debt and diverts resources
top_pain_points.example_quote: They don't want to waste time building a solution, then acquiring technical debt

winning_value_props.value: Automated drift detection for fraud and churn models
Reduce troubleshooting from weeks to hours with automated RCA
Purpose-built platform avoids technical debt of homegrown solutions
Improve model accuracy for critical business models

common_objections.objection: We're considering building our own monitoring solution
common_objections.effective_response: Spark New Zealand considered that path but realized it would create technical debt and divert their data scientists from core work. They chose Arize so they could focus on improving model accuracy, not maintaining tooling.

common_objections.objection: Our team is already overwhelmed - we don't have time to implement new tools
common_objections.effective_response: That's exactly the problem - your team is spending 70% of their time troubleshooting. Arize reduces that dramatically. Spark found they could resolve issues in hours instead of weeks after implementing Arize.

common_objections.objection: How do we know this will actually improve model accuracy?
common_objections.effective_response: Spark New Zealand tracked improvement in their broadband churn model - their most critical model. Catching drift earlier and resolving issues faster directly improved accuracy. We can structure a similar PoC to measure impact.

discovery_questions.question: When your fraud or churn models show accuracy degradation, how long does it typically take your team to identify the root cause?
discovery_questions.follow_up_if_yes: What percentage of your data science team's time goes to troubleshooting vs new development?

discovery_questions.question: How are you currently detecting drift in your production models before it impacts business outcomes?
discovery_questions.follow_up_if_yes: How quickly can you act once drift is detected?
discovery_questions.follow_up_if_no: What happens when drift goes undetected?

discovery_questions.question: Have you considered building internal monitoring vs buying a purpose-built platform?
discovery_questions.follow_up_if_yes: What's the estimated ongoing maintenance cost of that approach?

discovery_questions.question: Which model is most critical to your business - if it degraded significantly, what would be the impact?
discovery_questions.follow_up_if_yes: How would you quantify a 1% accuracy improvement for that model?
